Resources

enter code hereWe can’t document everything! This page will be a repository of as many useful resources for GIS/Cartography/Web-Mapping as we can find. If there are any resources that we haven’t listed, please email us at giscollective@gmail.com and share the knowledge!

GIS

  • Quantum GIS (QGIS) – Download

Python

  • Python and GIS
    • Geoprocessing with Python using Open Source GIS (Great Slides for Learning GDAL Basics)
    • GDAL/OGR Tutorials
    • GDAL API Tutorial
    • OGR2OGR Cheatsheet
  • Shapely (PostGIS operations outside of a database context)
    • Download Shapely
    • Shapely User Manual
    • Shapely Documentation
  • Fiona (A simplified OGR)
    • Download Fiona
    • Fiona Home Page (GitHub)
    • Fiona’s Docs and Manual
    • Fiona’s ReadMe
  • PyProj (Performs cartographic transformations)
    • PyProj Homepage
    • Download PyProj
    • PyProj Documentation
  • NumPy (Scientific Computing Tools for Python)
    • NumPy Home Page
    • Download NumPy
    • NumPy Tutorial
  • NetworkX (Creation, manipulation, and study of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks)
    • NetworkX Home Page
    • Tutorial
    • Reference Guide
    • Examples
  • PySal (Supports development of high level applications for spatial analysis)
    • PySal Home Page
    • Download PySal
    • PySal Documentation

Cartography

  • Kanetix.ca Travel Guide to Cartographic Resources
  • Typography
    • The League of Moveable Type (Open-source typography)
    • Fonts For Web (Free Web Font Sharing)
    • Da Font (Free Fonts)
    • Lost Type Co-op (Pay-What-You-Want Font foundry)
    • Font Squirrel (Hand-Selected Quality Fonts)
    • 1001 Free Fonts
  • Projections
    • Kartograph Map Projections App
  • Color
    • Color Brewer
    • Hailpixel

    • Leaflet Homepage

  • PostgreSQL/Post-GIS

    • PostGIS Quick Guide and Reference

  •  Penn State Online Geospatial Education Cloud and Server GIS Course (course resources available free online)

Data Sources

  • Natural Earth (Public Domain Map Datasets)
  • GeoCommons (Open Repository of Maps and Data)
  • GeoCommunity (GIS Data Portal; Great for finding DEMs)
  • TIGER Data by the US Census (Census Geographic Data)
  • National Map
  • USDA Geospatial Data Gateway
  • Minnesota DNR Data Deli
  • Map Library (Developing Country Administrative Boundaries)
  • UW Madison Map Library’s Data Collection (A seriously intense repository, everything you need and more!)
  • UW-Madison Geospatial Alliance
  • Wisconsin DNR Public Data FTP Site
  • Hydrography – The National Map USGS
